metadata.title: CVE-2018-16846 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
It was found in Ceph versions before 13.2.4 that authenticated ceph RGWusers can cause a denial of service against OMAPs holding bucket indices.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-base - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-common - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-fuse - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-mds - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-mgr - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-mon - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-osd - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-resource-agents - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
ceph-test - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libcephfs-java - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libcephfs-jni - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libcephfs2 - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
librados2 - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libradosstriper1 - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
librbd1 - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
librgw2 - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python-ceph - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python-cephfs - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python-rados - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python-rbd - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python-rgw - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python3-ceph-argparse - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python3-cephfs - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python3-rados - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python3-rbd - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
python3-rgw - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
radosgw - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
rbd-fuse - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
rbd-mirror - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
rbd-nbd - 12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ceph package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '12.2.11-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
